client requests as well as setting a high standard for customer service for the rest of the team to follow Responsible for supporting email calendaring video and telecommunications as well as mobile handheld devices Palm Blackberry and Windows devices Improved existing documentation Helped develop and maintain intranet content for end users Education Associate in Applied Science degree in Network Security Heald College 2008
